meanings.definition: Strongly sexual or sensual in nature.
meanings.sent1: The movie had a concupiscent scene that made some viewers uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist the concupiscent allure of the forbidden fruit.
meanings.sent3: The concupiscent cat kept trying to seduce the neighbor's pet rabbit.
meanings.sent4: The concupiscent flames of desire burned brightly in his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The concupiscent dance performance left the audience breathless.

meanings.sent1: His concupiscent thoughts distracted him during the lecture.
meanings.sent2: The concupiscent teenager blushed when caught staring at their crush.
meanings.sent3: The concupiscent puppy wagged its tail eagerly at the sight of a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The concupiscent hunger for success drove her to work tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: The concupiscent longing in his heart yearned for her touch.

meanings.definition: Lustful or passionate in a sexual way.
meanings.sent1: The concupiscent embrace between the lovers was filled with desire.
meanings.sent2: She felt a concupiscent urge to kiss him under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The concupiscent chef added an extra dash of spice to the romantic dinner.
meanings.sent4: His concupiscent gaze lingered on her lips, longing for a kiss.
meanings.sent5: The concupiscent whispers of love filled the night with passion.
